id	name
1	Justice League
2	Teen Titans

paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

/* Set Operators */

SELECT
    alias, name
FROM 
    demo.supers AS s INNER JOIN
    demo.supersteams AS st ON s.id = st.supersid
WHERE 
    st.teamsid = 1 
union
SELECT 
    alias, name
FROM 
    demo.supers AS s INNER JOIN
    demo.supersteams AS st ON s.id = st.supersid
WHERE 
    st.teamsid = 2

paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

/* Table Value Constructor */

SELECT 
    alias, name, rescues
FROM 
    demo.supers AS s INNER JOIN
    demo.supersteams AS st ON s.id = st.supersid
WHERE 
    st.teamsid = 1
UNION
values ('The Developer','Rob Hedgpeth', 0)

Batman	Bruce Wayne	192
Superman	Clark Kent	257
Wonder Woman	Diana Prince	212
Robin/Nightwing	Dick Grayson	127
The Developer	Rob Hedgpeth	0

paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

/* Aggregate function */

SELECT 
    t.name, sum(rescues) 
FROM 
    demo.supers AS s INNER JOIN
    demo.supersteams AS st ON s.id = st.supersid INNER JOIN
    demo.teams AS t ON st.teamsid = t.id
GROUP BY 
    t.name;

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

msg.data:
name	sum(rescues)
Justice League	788
Teen Titans	186

paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

/* Rollup */

SELECT 
    t.name, sum(rescues), avg(rescues)
FROM 
    demo.supers AS s INNER JOIN
    demo.supersteams AS st ON s.id = st.supersid INNER JOIN
    demo.teams AS t ON st.teamsid = t.id
GROUP BY 
    t.name
WITH ROLLUP;
